response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Considering its high quality and functionality, we're confident it's worth more than $80 to you, given its value to others is around $120. We're extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $100. This price not only ensures you get the best value for your investment but also allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market. We hope you'll find this offer appealing and decide to make the purchase.", "product_price": 100}
